title: The Editor-Approved Straight-Leg Jeans Your Denim Drawer Needs
description: Your future favorites are right this way.
excerpt: Your future favorites have arrived—shop the best straight-leg jeans for women to add to your denim collection, stat.

html:
Legs for Days

Rag & Bone Shea High-Rise Relaxed Straight Jean

These are an incredibly flattering, non-stretch high-rise cut. Rag & Bone denim is made from quality cotton that will only get softer with each wear, and this choice is the perfect wash for any occasion. Wear them with a low-heel mule and collarless jacket to dress them up or suede sneakers to keep it casual.

Sizes: 23-34

Color: Adeline

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 32”

The Ink Black Jean

Khaite Corben Jean in Bartlett

Ideal for work, the Corben jean is a capsule wardrobe necessity. They’re available in an inky black wash that won’t fade and a timeless vintage blue. They’re crisp, they’re sophisticated, and they go with everything.

Sizes: 23-32

Color: Bartlett, Boone

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Slight Stretch

In-seam: 30.5”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Soaring High Rise

Levi’s Ribcage Full Length Jeans

These are a staple in every closet. The Ribcage is a super high-rise style that defines the waist and elongates the legs. This denim is buttery soft and offers just the right amount of stretch. The hemline is full-length for a vintage-inspired look. Wear this with an Adidas Samba sneaker and a classic white tee for a casual, comfortable look.

Sizes: 24-34

Color: Samba Tango Light

Materials: 99% cotton, 1% elastane

Stretch: Slight stretch

In-seam: 32”

Customer review: “Jeans that fit… THE BEST FEELING! I love these and the way they hug my lower half. Butt looks good! Fits like a glove. Highly recommend!”

The Laid-Back Look

DL1961 Drue Low Rise Straight Jeans

These are sure to have everyone asking where you got them. This editor-loved style (recommended by senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong) sits low and square on the waist for a relaxed look. Wear these with kitten heels, a blazer, and a small shoulder bag for an elevated, laid-back look.

Sizes: 23-34

Color: Seagate (Vintage)

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 32”

Customer review: “I love these jeans! They are so cute on! They are great quality, heavier denim but soft enough and not too much material. They fit great in the booty and have a more relaxed fit throughout the leg.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Vintage-Inspired Jean

Paige Sawyer High Waist Straight Leg Jeans in Matchstick

The subtle texture and fading give these a perfect vintage look, making them look like your favorite lived-in pair. Pair this option with sock boots and a statement jacket.

Sizes: 23-33

Color: Matchstick

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 29.5”

The Casual Black Jean

Moussy Vintage Iona Straight Low-Rise Jean

The Iona is perfect for individuals who enjoy a low-rise, relaxed fit. Made from heavy-weight and durable denim, this casual style features a concealed button fly. Complement the faded wash with a sleek black bodysuit and heels or a vintage graphic tee and leather boots.

Sizes: 23-32

Color: Blk

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 29.5”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Cuff Jean

Mother The Dodger Button Hover Cuff

The groovy Dodger jean features a statement cuff that is made to show off your favorite shoes. This looser straight-leg design is excellent for those who want something eye-catching but still want to maximize comfort. The cuff can also be folded down if you prefer a more traditional look.

Sizes: 23-34; also available in petite

Color: Funk N’ Flair

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 29”

The Show-Off

Anine Bing Roy Jean

The Roy features side slits along both leg openings, making them another great choice to show off your most stylish footwear. This classic blue jean color is one of my favorites and serves as an easy, dependable option with a little extra flair.

Sizes: 23-32

Color: Nordic Blue

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 35”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Everyday Jean

Agolde Kelly Jean in Eclipse

This faded black jean will give any outfit an edgy look. The casual style is a season must-have and features denim that looks authentically whiskered for a versatile, vintage look you can wear anywhere.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: 8 options

Materials: Regenerative cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 32”

The Timeless Jean

Frame The Vertical

The Vertical is a new style from Frame, a brand known for its timeless, well-fitting denim in modern cuts. These are made from rigid denim and have a classic button-fly closure, a high waist, and a full-length inseam that also comes in a non-faded black wash.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: Laurence, Death Valley

Materials: Regenerative cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 32.5”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Studded Jean

Veronica Beard Dylan Studded High-Rise Straight Ankle Jean

If you’re looking to add something unique to your denim drawer, these studded jeans fit the bill. These are a soft, non-stretch style in a medium wash and feature silver stud embellishments down both legs. Pair them with strappy heels and a slim-fitting top for a stunning nighttime outfit.

Sizes: 23-32

Color: Stoned Serendipity

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 27”

The Versatile Jean

Frame Le Sleek Straight in Thunderstorm

These aren’t called Le Sleek for no reason! This leg-lengthening option features plenty of stretch and is comfortable for everyday wear. The dark wash allows these jeans to easily be dressed up or down for casual outings and dinner dates.

Sizes: 23-34

Color: 9 options

Materials: Cotton, rayon, 1% elastane

Stretch: Super stretchy

In-seam: 28”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Sweatpant Jean

Rag & Bone Miramar Terry Shea Pant

For true comfort, look no further. What’s more comfortable than sweatpants? These jeans, which are actually sweatpants, are printed with a special technique that fools the eye. And yes, they really do look just like jeans!

Sizes: 23-34

Color: Riverly, Raven

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Medium Stretch

In-seam: 32.25”

The Curve-Hugger

Abercrombie Curve Love Ultra High Rise ’90s Straight Jean

These soft, stretchy jeans are always my go-to. These are unbelievably flattering and ideal for curvier body types. This pair features extra room in the hips and thighs. Say goodbye to the issue of the waist gap with this option that comes in 12 colors!

Sizes: 23-37

Color: 12 options

Materials: 99% Cotton, 1% Elastane

Stretch: Stretchy

In-seam: 5 options

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Distressed Jean

Agolde Kelly High Rise Relaxed Straight

These jeans have slashes at the knees for a distressed look that still looks put together. Pair them with a New Balance sneaker and a slouchy tee for a weekend-ready outfit that’s effortlessly stylish.

Sizes: 23-34

Color: Backdrop

Materials: Cotton

Stretch: Non-stretch

In-seam: 31.5”

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
